languages.text: Невзирая на расползающийся по палубе газ, офицеры продолжают суетиться над станциями, выполняя ранее отданные приказы Лорд-капитана. Даже когда двери мостика вскрывают, команда продолжает работать до последнего. Последн{mf|им|ей}, надсадно кашляя, с мостика выбегает Лорд-капитан.

traits.locale_text: Невзирая на расползающийся по палубе газ, офицеры продолжают суетиться над станциями, выполняя ранее отданные приказы Лорд-капитана. Даже когда двери мостика вскрывают, команда продолжает работать до последнего. Последн{mf|им|ей}, надсадно кашляя, с мостика выбегает Лорд-капитан.

languages.text: Heedless to the gas spreading over the deck, the officers continue their flurry of work at their stations, executing the orders issued by the Lord Captain. Even when the doors to the bridge are opened, the crew carries on for as long as they can. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.
languages.original_text: Невзирая на расползающийся по палубе газ, офицеры продолжают суетиться над станциями, выполняя ранее отданные приказы Лорд-капитана. Даже когда двери мостика вскрывают, команда продолжает работать до последнего. Последн{mf|им|ей}, надсадно кашляя, с мостика выбегает Лорд-капитан.

traits.locale_text: Despite the gas spreading over the deck, the officers at their stations continue working in a hurry, executing the orders issued by the Lord Captain. Even when the doors to the bridge are opened, the crew carries on for as long as they can. The last one to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

Despite the gas spreading over the deck, the officers at their stations continue working in a hurry, executing the orders issued by the Lord Captain. Even when the doors to the bridge are opened, the crew carries on for as long as they can. The last one to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

Heedless to the gas spreading over the deck, the officers continue their flurry of work at their stations, executing the orders issued by the Lord Captain. Even when the doors to the bridge are opened, the crew carries on for as long as they can. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

Heedless to the gas spreading over the deck, the officers continue their flurry of work at their stations, executing the orders issued by the Lord Captain. Even when the doors to the bridge are opened, the crew carries on for as long as they can. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

Heedless to the gas spreading over the deck, the officers continue their flurry of work at their stations, executing the orders issued by the Lord Captain. Even when the doors to the bridge are opened, the crew carries on for as long as they can. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

languages.text: Haciendo caso omiso del gas que inunda la cubierta, los oficiales trabajan frenéticamente en sus puestos cumpliendo las órdenes de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Incluso cuando las puertas del puente se abren, siguen trabajando hasta que no pueden más. {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} abandona el puente en último lugar, tosiendo con fuerza.
languages.original_text: Heedless to the gas spreading over the deck, the officers continue their flurry of work at their stations, executing the orders issued by the Lord Captain. Even when the doors to the bridge are opened, the crew carries on for as long as they can. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

traits.locale_text: Haciendo caso omiso del gas que inunda la cubierta, los oficiales trabajan frenéticamente en sus puestos cumpliendo las órdenes de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Incluso cuando las puertas del puente se abren, siguen trabajando hasta que no pueden más. {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} abandona el puente en último lugar, tosiendo con fuerza.

languages.text: 军官们无视了在甲板上蔓延的毒气，继续忙碌在各自的岗位上，执行领主舰长发出的命令。即便是舰桥的门打开之后，船员们仍在尽可能地坚守岗位。最后一位离开舰桥的是领主舰长，跑出来之后便剧烈地咳嗽起来。
languages.original_text: Heedless to the gas spreading over the deck, the officers continue their flurry of work at their stations, executing the orders issued by the Lord Captain. Even when the doors to the bridge are opened, the crew carries on for as long as they can. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

traits.locale_text: 军官们无视了在甲板上蔓延的毒气，继续忙碌在各自的岗位上，执行领主舰长发出的命令。即便是舰桥的门打开之后，船员们仍在尽可能地坚守岗位。最后一位离开舰桥的是领主舰长，跑出来之后便剧烈地咳嗽起来。

languages.text: デッキにガスが広がっているというのに、士官達は自分達の持ち場で慌ただしく仕事を続け、ロード・キャプテンの命令を実行していた。ブリッジの扉が開いた後も、クルーは可能な限り作業を続けている。最後にブリッジを出たロード・キャプテンは、激しく咳き込みつつ走る。
languages.original_text: Heedless to the gas spreading over the deck, the officers continue their flurry of work at their stations, executing the orders issued by the Lord Captain. Even when the doors to the bridge are opened, the crew carries on for as long as they can. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

traits.locale_text: デッキにガスが広がっているというのに、士官達は自分達の持ち場で慌ただしく仕事を続け、ロード・キャプテンの命令を実行していた。ブリッジの扉が開いた後も、クルーは可能な限り作業を続けている。最後にブリッジを出たロード・キャプテンは、激しく咳き込みつつ走る。

languages.text: Ungeachtet des Gases, das sich auf dem Deck ausbreitet, setzen die Offiziere ihre hektische Arbeit auf ihren Stationen fort und führen die vom Lord Captain erteilten Befehle aus. Selbst als die Türen zur Brücke geöffnet werden, macht die Besatzung so lange weiter, wie sie kann. Als letzter verlässt der Lord Captain die Brücke und läuft hustend hinaus.
languages.original_text: Heedless to the gas spreading over the deck, the officers continue their flurry of work at their stations, executing the orders issued by the Lord Captain. Even when the doors to the bridge are opened, the crew carries on for as long as they can. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

languages.text: Sans se soucier du gaz qui se répand sur le pont, les officiers restent consciencieusement à leur poste pour exécuter les ordres {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Ils continuent à s'affairer le plus longtemps possible, même après que les portes ont été ouvertes. Une fois que tous les autres ont évacué, {name} quitte le pont à son tour en toussant bruyamment.
languages.original_text: Heedless to the gas spreading over the deck, the officers continue their flurry of work at their stations, executing the orders issued by the Lord Captain. Even when the doors to the bridge are opened, the crew carries on for as long as they can. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

traits.locale_text: Sans se soucier du gaz qui se répand sur le pont, les officiers restent consciencieusement à leur poste pour exécuter les ordres {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Ils continuent à s'affairer le plus longtemps possible, même après que les portes ont été ouvertes. Une fois que tous les autres ont évacué, {name} quitte le pont à son tour en toussant bruyamment.

languages.text: Güverteye yayılan gaza aldırış etmeyen subaylar, Lord Kaptan'ın verdiği emirleri yerine getirmek üzere görev yerlerinde çalışmaya devam ediyor. Mürettebat, köprünün kapıları açıldığında dahi ellerinden geldiği kadar yerlerinde kalıyor. Köprüden son çıkan kişi olan Lord Kaptan, öksürerek dışarı koşuyor.
languages.original_text: Heedless to the gas spreading over the deck, the officers continue their flurry of work at their stations, executing the orders issued by the Lord Captain. Even when the doors to the bridge are opened, the crew carries on for as long as they can. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

Mürettebat, köprünün kapıları açıldığında dahi ellerinden geldiği kadar yerlerinde kalıyor. Köprüden son çıkan kişi olan Lord Kaptan, öksürerek dışarı koşuyor.
